verses.verse: "And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'O mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> the enemy <S%H340><s%> has spoken <S%H559><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, 'Aha! <S%H1889><s%>' and, 'The everlasting <S%H5769><s%> heights <S%H1116><s%> have become <S%H1961><s%> our possession, <S%H4181><s%>'

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "For good cause <S%H3282><s%> they have made <S%H8074><s%> you desolate <S%H8074><s%> and crushed <S%H9575><s%> you from every <S%H5439><s%> side, <S%H5439><s%> that you should become <S%H1961><s%> a possession <S%H4181><s%> of the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and you have been taken <S%H5927><s%> up in the talk <S%H8193><s%> and the whispering <S%H1681><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>"' "

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the ravines <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> to the desolate <S%H8074><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%> and to the forsaken <S%H5800><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have become <S%H1961><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%> and a derision <S%H3933><s%> to the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are round <S%H5439><s%> about, <S%H5439><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> of My jealousy <S%H7068><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Edom, <S%H9000><s%> who <S%H834><s%> appropriated <S%H5414><s%> My land <S%H776><s%> for themselves as a possession <S%H4181><s%> with wholehearted <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3824><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> [and] with scorn <S%H7589><s%> of soul, <S%H5315><s%> to drive <S%H1644><s%> it out for a prey. <S%H957><s%>"

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the ravines <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in My jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in My wrath <S%H2534><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> you have endured <S%H5375><s%> the insults <S%H3639><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'I have sworn <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> that surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> you will themselves <S%H1992><s%> endure <S%H5375><s%> their insults. <S%H3639><s%>

'But you, O mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you will put <S%H5414><s%> forth your branches <S%H6057><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> for My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for they will soon <S%H7126><s%> come. <S%H935><s%>
'For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am for you, and I will turn <S%H6437><s%> to you, and you shall be cultivated <S%H5647><s%> and sown. <S%H2232><s%>

'And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> men <S%H120><s%> on you, all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of it; and the cities <S%H5892><s%> will be inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places <S%H2723><s%> will be rebuilt. <S%H1129><s%>

'And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> on you man <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> and they will increase <S%H7235><s%> and be fruitful; <S%H6509><s%> and I will cause you to be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as you were formerly <S%H6927><s%> and will treat <S%H3190><s%> you better <S%H3190><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> at the first. <S%H7221><s%> Thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'Yes, I will cause men <S%H120><s%> – My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> – to walk <S%H1980><s%> on you and possess <S%H3423><s%> you, so that you will become <S%H1961><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> and never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> bereave <S%H7921><s%> them of children. <S%H7921><s%>'

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Because <S%H3282><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> to you, "You are a devourer <S%H398><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and have bereaved <S%H7921><s%> your nation <S%H1471><s%> of children, <S%H7921><s%> "

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> you will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> bereave <S%H7921><s%> your nation <S%H1471><s%> of children, <S%H7921><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And I will not let you hear <S%H8085><s%> insults <S%H3639><s%> from the nations <S%H1471><s%> anymore, <S%H5750><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will you bear <S%H5375><s%> disgrace <S%H2781><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will you cause your nation <S%H1471><s%> to stumble <S%H3782><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>' "
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> when the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was living <S%H3427><s%> in their own land, <S%H127><s%> they defiled <S%H2930><s%> it by their ways <S%H1870><s%> and their deeds; <S%H5949><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me was like the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of a woman in her impurity. <S%H5079><s%>

"Therefore, I poured <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them for the blood <S%H1818><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had shed <S%H8210><s%> on the land, <S%H776><s%> because they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> it with their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

"Also I scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they were dispersed <S%H2219><s%> throughout the lands. <S%H776><s%> According to their ways <S%H1870><s%> and their deeds <S%H5949><s%> I judged <S%H8199><s%> them.

"When they came <S%H935><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they went, <S%H935><s%> they profaned <S%H2490><s%> My holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> because it was said <S%H559><s%> of them, 'These <S%H428><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> yet they have come <S%H3381><s%> out of His land. <S%H776><s%>'

"But I had concern <S%H2550><s%> for My holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they went. <S%H935><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "It is not for your sake, <S%H4616><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that I am about to act, <S%H6213><s%> but for My holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you went. <S%H935><s%>

"And I will vindicate <S%H6942><s%> the holiness <S%H6942><s%> of My great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> which has been profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> in their midst. <S%H8432><s%> Then the nations <S%H1471><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "when I prove <S%H6942><s%> Myself holy <S%H6942><s%> among you in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
"For I will take <S%H3947><s%> you from the nations, <S%H1471><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> the lands, <S%H776><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> you into your own land. <S%H127><s%>

"Then I will sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> on you, and you will be clean; <S%H2891><s%> I will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> your filthiness <S%H2932><s%> and from all <S%H3605><s%> your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

"Moreover, I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you; and I will remove <S%H5493><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> from your flesh <S%H1320><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

"And I will put <S%H5414><s%> My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you and cause <S%H6213><s%> you to walk <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and you will be careful <S%H8104><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> My ordinances. <S%H4941><s%>
"And you will live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to your forefathers; so you will be My people, <S%H1><s%> and I will be your God. <S%H5971><s%>

"Moreover, I will save <S%H3467><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> your uncleanness; <S%H2932><s%> and I will call <S%H7121><s%> for the grain <S%H1715><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> it, and I will not bring <S%H5414><s%> a famine <S%H7458><s%> on you.

"And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree <S%H6086><s%> and the produce <S%H8570><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> that you may not receive <S%H3947><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> the disgrace <S%H2781><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"Then you will remember <S%H2142><s%> your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> and your deeds <S%H4611><s%> that were not good, <S%H2896><s%> and you will loathe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

"I am not doing <S%H6213><s%> [this] for your sake, <S%H4616><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "let it be known <S%H3045><s%> to you. Be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H3637><s%> for your ways, <S%H1870><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel! <S%H3478><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "On the day <S%H3117><s%> that I cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> I will cause the cities <S%H5892><s%> to be inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places <S%H2723><s%> will be rebuilt. <S%H1129><s%>

"And the desolate <S%H8074><s%> land <S%H776><s%> will be cultivated <S%H5647><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of being <S%H1961><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of everyone <S%H3605><s%> who passed <S%H5674><s%> by.

"And they will say, <S%H559><s%> 'This <S%H1976><s%> desolate <S%H8074><s%> land <S%H776><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> like the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden; <S%H5731><s%> and the waste, <S%H2720><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and ruined <S%H2040><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are fortified <S%H1219><s%> [and] inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>'

"Then the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have rebuilt <S%H1129><s%> the ruined <S%H2040><s%> places [and] planted <S%H5193><s%> that which was desolate; <S%H8074><s%> I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> and will do <S%H6213><s%> it."

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> also <S%H5750><s%> I will let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> ask <S%H1875><s%> Me to do <S%H6213><s%> for them: I will increase <S%H7235><s%> their men <S%H120><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>

"Like the flock <S%H6629><s%> for sacrifices, <S%H6944><s%> like the flock <S%H6629><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> during her appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will the waste <S%H2720><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> be filled <S%H4392><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"' "
